name: UFEEGA Battle Prototype (2013)
description:
My entry for the Fragment Jam in June - July 2019

The unfinished sequel to "UDIMA: Fatal Error's Great Adventure", one of U-GameZ earliest games!

This time, it would have been more of an RPG than a platformer, inspired by the Paper Mario series, right down to the turn based battle system with action elements. 

I worked on this version  of the game between 2013 -2015. Unfortunately I lost some assets due to harddrive failure. I halted development of UFEEGA in favor of Error Ware 2. I made tons of animation for the player character "Fatal Error", but none for the enemies lol I also created almost the whole soundtrack which you can listen to on Bandcamp!

This prototype lets walk around a small area and fight some hogs. 

Press F1 to display the keyboard controls & some fun debug keys! 

Please excuse bugs or unfinished graphics, this is not a finished game!
